Thank gd ,praise the lord ,who gave strength to talk bravely ,to talk truth .u r a excerlant speaker..Happy n very proud of u . This shows clearly tht no doubt " Justice will win, Pl Make sure to choose the right people next time.do not be quick ,to vote ,otherwise another hell will lose.
 We must n should send this heartless thugs home.permanantly wipe out of parliament never to pop up again .bec we no need ,masacre any more.we no need civil war .All we need lov one another .** To Live in peace n harmony .Not at all to live with fear.So pl get up ,stand up ,fight for right ,But Not with wepons,
Not by war .by mature understanding,with respect for one another  ,living in har  
mony for ever. Gd bl u ,Anusha
